official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations to carry out the Atlantic Tunas Convention Act of 1975 during Fiscal Years 1987, 1988 and 1989.

summary.text: Amends the Atlantic Tunas Convention Act to authorize appropriations for FY 1986 through 1989.
